name: The Greek Sheep Panic
description:
Are you sleeping, herdsman? Wake up and serve your god!

My name is Pan, I am the greatest god of herdsmen on Olympus! My beloved sheep has run away. I want you to lead her to my altar as soon as possible. Do you realize that I am making you an offer which you cannot refuse?

Good. I’ll give you the instructions. Are you writing?

Use your staff (left mouse button) to show my sheep the direction. Look around (WASD) and beware: you must notice danger in time and help my sheep to escape.

Yeah, sorry, danger and difficulties definitely will meet you on your way. Other gods always try to stop me from doing my job. Surely, they will distract you with all sorts of nonsense and will not let you go further until you fulfill their wishes. There is nothing I can do. Gods are stubborn and easily enraged. Just do what the say and don’t get in trouble, okay?

Don’t worry, you will not get confused. My celestial arrows in the sky will show you the way. I am sure, even Mom would have figured it out, and he is the god of foolishness. You are better than this, right?

Now get moving and fulfill the wish of your greatest god! And remember: do not let my sheep get hurt or die. If you dare to lose, I will turn the wrath of all Olympus on you!
